unnormalised: My grandfather, Mr. Sharma, was diagnosed with Parkinson's at AIIMS, Delhi last year; Dr. Rao prescribed him Madopar 125mg thrice daily. His tremors have reduced a bit, thankfully.
normalised: My grandfather, Mister Sharma, was diagnosed with Parkinson's at A-I-I-M-S, Delhi last year; Doctor Rao prescribed him Madopar one hundred and twenty five milligram thrice daily. His tremors have reduced a bit, thankfully.
